description: Place X charge token(s) within range 1 and in line of sight of your unit leader.
name: Arm X: Charge Type

description: Claim an objective token that is in base contact with your unit leader.
name: Claim

description: Perform a move during which you ignore terrain that is height X or lower. This is treated as a move action.
name: Jump X

description: Choose a friendly trooper unit at range 1-2. That unit may perform a free attack action or a free move action.
name: Pulling the Strings

description: Gain 1 aim token and 1 dodge token.
name: Quick Thinking

description: Place a wound token on this card to remove X wound, ion, or vehicle damage token(s) from a friendly ground vehicle at range 1 and in line of sight. Limit Y tokens.
name: Repair X: Capacity Y

description: If you are in base contact with an objective token, either remove 1 wound token from it or place 1 wound token on it.
name: Sabotage/Repair

description: Once per game, if you are within an enemy deployment zone, place 1 victory token on you. At the end of the game, if you have a victory token, gain that token.
name: Secret Mission

description: Place X smoke token(s) within range 1 and in line of sight of your unit leader.
name: Smoke X

description: Choose up to X friendly units at range 1. Each chosen unit gains an aim token.
name: Spotter X

description: Choose up to X friendly trooper units at range 1. Each chosen unit gains a dodge token.
name: Take Cover X

description: Place a wound token on this card to remove 1 wound token from or restore 1 mini to a friendly non-emplacement trooper unit at range 1 and in line of sight. Limit 2 tokens.
name: Treat X: Y

description: Unless you have a faceup order token, your first action must be Attack, if able; or move.
name: AI: Attack/Move

description: While defending, cancel all hit results.
name: Armor

description: While defending, cancel X hit results.
name: Armor X

description: While attacking, each model on this unit can use up to X of its weapons.
name: Arsenal X

description: After performing an attack with this weapon, you may perform up to 2 extra attack using only this weapon. Each attack must be against an enemy unit that is in line of sight, has not already defended, and is at range 1 of the previous defender.
name: Beam

description: Ignore cover.
name: Blast

description: While defending, if you spend a dodge token, you gain "%{surgeBlock} : %{block}".
name: Block

description: After setup, place a victory token on an enemy commander or operative. If you defeat a unit with a victory token, move that token to you. At the end of the game, if you have a victory token, gain that token.
name: Bounty

description: After you perform a move action, you may perform a free melee attack action.
name: Charge

description: You are treated as a trooper for the purposes of vertical movement.
name: Climbing Vehicle

description: After another friendly unit at range 1-2 rallies, if it is suppressed but not panicked, it may gain 1 suppression token to perform a free move action.
name: Compel

description: After you are issued an order, you may issue an order to a friendly X at range 1.
name: Coordinate: X

description: While defending against a ranged attack, improve your cover by X.
name: Cover X

description: While converting offensive surges, change up to X %{surgeHit} results to %{crit} result(s).
name: Critical X

description: You cannot use this weapon and move [except for pivots] during the same activation.
name: Cumbersome

description: When your commander specific command cards are played, if there would be a bid for priority, treat your command card as though it had 1 fewer pip.
name: Cunning

description: You may choose not to remove your suppression tokens. While defending against a ranged attack, roll 1 extra defense die for each suppression token you have, adding up to X extra dice.
name: Danger Sense X

description: After you rally, if you are suppressed but not panicked, you may gain 1 suppression token to perform a free move action.
name: Dauntless

description: While defending, if you spend a dodge token, you gain “Surge: Block”: if it’s a ranged attack, the attacker suffers 1 wound for each Surge rolled.
name: Deflect

description: After your Rally step, an enemy unit range 1-2 gains up to 1 suppression token.
name: Demoralize X

description: After a unit controlled by any player performs an action, each unit that has a weapon with the detonate x: charge type keyword may detonate x friendly charge tokens of the specified type.
name: Detonate X: Y

description: When you are issued an order, you may remove up to X suppression tokens.
name: Disciplined X

description: You can perform moves while engaged with 1 unit.
name: Disengage

description: While you have X or more wound tokens, treat your courage as '-' and gain Charge.
name: Enrage X

description: While building an army, ignore the rank of 1 X unit. During the Command Phase, you may issue an order to a friendly X unit at range 1-2.
name: Entourage: X

description: While clambering, do not roll defense dice or suffer wounds.
name: Expert Climber

description: When another friendly unit performs a ranged attack, if you have a faceup order token, each mini in your unit may add an eligible weapon to the attack pool. If you do, flip your order token facedown. Limit 1 Fire Support per attack pool.
name: Fire Support

description: The defender must be inside your front arc, rear arc, or 1 of both side arcs.
name: Fixed: front/rear/side

description: When you pivot, you can pivot up to 360°.
name: Full Pivot

description: During the End Phase, flip X inactive shield tokens.
name: Generator X

description: You cannot clamber.
name: Grounded

description: When a friendly unit at range 1 is defending against a ranged attack, you may choose up to X hit result(s). For each result chosen, roll a defense die as though you were the defender.
name: Guardian X

description: After you perform a ranged attack action, you may perform an additional ranged attack against a different unit.
name: Gunslinger

description: You must equip a Heavy Weapon upgrade card. The mini added by that card is your unit leader.
name: Heavy Weapon Team

description: While attacking, if each weapon in your attack pool has High Velocity, the defender cannot spend dodge tokens.
name: High Velocity

description: Blast/Deflect/Melee/Pierce cannot be used against you.
name: Immune: Blast/Deflect/Melee/Pierce

description: While attacking a unit that has Armor, change up to X %{hit} result(s) to %{crit} result(s).
name: Impact X

description: While defending, if the attack pool has Pierce X, roll x additional dice.
name: Impervious

description: During the Rally step, roll red defense dice instead of white.
name: Indomitable

description: When an enemy unit performs an attack, if you have at least 1 suppression token, it must attack another unit, if able. During your Rally step, you may choose not to remove your suppression tokens.
name: Inconspicuous

description: A vehicle or droid wounded by an attack that includes this weapon gains X ion token(s).
name: Ion X

description: After your rally step, remove X suppression token(s) from another friendly unit at range 1-2.
name: Inspire X

description: You may deploy anywhere beyond range 3 of all enemy units.
name: Infiltrate

description: While attacking a unit that has a Force upgrade icon, you gain "%{surgeHit} : %{crit}".
name: Jedi Hunter

description: The added mini is your unit leader.
name: Leader

description: You may transport one friendly trooper unit that consists of exactly 1 small base unit. After defending, if you suffered 1 or more wounds, each unit you were transporting suffers 1 wound.
name: Light Transport X: Open

description: While defending, if you have light cover, improve your cover by 1.
name: Low Profile

description: At the end of your activation, you may ready X of your Force upgrade cards.
name: Master of the Force X

description: After defending, if you spent 1 or more dodge tokens, gain 1 dodge token.
name: Nimble

description: If an upgrade that adds a miniature to a unit has the noncombatant keyword, the mini added by that upgrade cannot use any weapons and wounds must be assigned to other non-unit leader minis first.
name: Noncombatant

description: When attacking, ignore up to X block results.
name: Pierce X

description: A trooper wounded by an attack that includes this weapon gains X poison token(s).
name: Poison X

description: During your activation, you can perform only 1 standard move.
name: Plodding

description: When you spend an aim token, reroll up to X additional die/dice.
name: Precise X

description: While attacking, if you performed a full standard move at your maximum sped before this attack, you may turn 1 attack die to a %{crit} result.
name: Ram X

description: After you perform a standby action, gain 1 aim token.
name: Ready X

description: At the end of your activation, roll 1 white defense die for each wound token you have, up to X. For each Defense Surge or Block result, remove 1 wound token.
name: Regenerate X

description: After you perform a move action, you may perform a free attack action.
name: Relentless

description: Either before or after you perform a standard move, you may perform a free pivot action.
name: Reposition

description: You gain Unhindered and Expert Climber. You may perform a free clamber maneuver before or after you move.
name: Scale

description: After you deploy, you may perform a speed X move.
name: Scout X

description: Your standby range is 1-3.
name: Sentinel

description: While performing a ranged attack, reduce the defender’s cover by X.
name: Sharpshooter X

description: You have X shield tokens.
name: Shielded X

description: While performing a melee attack, this model can only use the weapon on this card.
name: Sidearm: Melee/Ranged

description: While defending or using Guardian, if you spend a dodge token, you gain "%{surgeBlock} : %{block}" and the attacker suffers 1 wound for each %{SurgeBlock} rolled.
name: Soresu Mastery

description: While moving, ignore terrain that is height X or lower. When you activate, perform a compulsory move.
name: Speeder X

description: Add this weapon's dice to the attack pool one time for each mini in the defending unit to which line of sight is not blocked.
name: Spray

description: While performing a move, you may gain 1 suppression token to increase your maximum speed by 1.
name: Spur

description: You cannot perform moves, except pivots.
name: Stationary

description: After you perform a move action, you may perform a free ranged attack action.
name: Steady

description: After you perform an attack, the defender that this weapon was used against gains 1 suppression token.
name: Suppressive

description: While you are at range 1-2 of X, when you or X gains an aim or dodge token, then other unit gains a token of the same type.
name: Teamwork: X

description: After a vehicle is wounded by an attack that includes this weapon, perform a pivot with that vehicle.
name: Tow Cable

description: You may transport one friendly trooper unit. After defending, if you suffered 1 or more wounds, each unit you were transporting suffers 1 wound.
name: Transport X: Open

description: While defending, you may reroll up to X defense dice.
name: Uncanny Luck X

description: You ignore the effects of difficult terrain.
name: Unhindered

description: You can spend dodge tokens to cancel %{crit} results.
name: Outmaneuver

description: You can perform ranged attacks using this weapon while engaged.
name: Versatile

description: While defending, if the attacker’s unit leader is inside your Y arc, the attack pool gains Impact X.
name: Weak Point X: Y

description: When you activate, you may increase you maximum speed to 3. If you do, until the end of the round, you gain Cover 2 and cannot attack or flip active shield tokens.
name: Wheel Move
